description: This file defines an interface INoteRepository for note storage operations, including asynchronous methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes within the NotesBackend application.

classes.name: INoteRepository
classes.description: An interface that abstracts note storage operations, defining methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes asynchronously.

methods.name: CreateAsync
methods.description: Creates a new note asynchronously and returns the created Note object.

methods.name: GetAllAsync
methods.description: Retrieves all notes asynchronously as a read-only list.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Fetches a note by its unique identifier asynchronously, returning null if not found.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Updates an existing note asynchronously, returning a boolean indicating success.

methods.name: DeleteAsync
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID asynchronously, returning a boolean indicating success.
